#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int MOD=1e9+7;
long long dp[1004];
void precalc()
{
	dp[0]=1,dp[1]=1;
	for(int i=2;i<1004;i++)
		dp[i]=(dp[i-1]+dp[i-2])%MOD;
}
int main() 
{
	int t,x,y;
	precalc();
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>x>>y;
		if(dp[y+1]<dp[x])	cout<<(dp[y+1]-dp[x])%MOD+MOD<<endl;
		else 			cout<<(dp[y+1]-dp[x])%MOD<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
